name: kpnu-students-automation

scripts.test mobile: npx playwright test tests/examples/ui --project='iPhone 12 Chrome'  --project='iPhone 12 Safari'
scripts.test mobile headed: npx playwright test tests/examples/ui --project='iPhone 12 Chrome'  --project='iPhone 12 Safari' --headed
scripts.test tablet: npx playwright test tests/examples/ui --project='Galaxy Tab S4 Chrome' --project='Galaxy Tab S4 Safari'  --project='iPad Pro Chrome'  --project='iPad Pro Safari'
scripts.test tablet headed: npx playwright test tests/examples/ui --project='Galaxy Tab S4 Chrome' --project='Galaxy Tab S4 Safari'  --project='iPad Pro Chrome'  --project='iPad Pro Safari' --headed

description: This is test automation framework developed for KPNU university. The main purpose is attract students for automation testing.
